abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", "TaxonKey is Cattleya Lindl." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from CSIC-Real Jardín Botánico-Colección de Plantas Vasculares (MA) 1 records from Herbario ABH (Universidad de Alicante) 1 records from HPAN - Herbário do Pantanal "Vali Joana Pott" 1 records from Colección de plantas vasculares de Brasil del Herbario "Jaime Andrés Rodríguez". LEB-Brasil 1 records from Bell Museum plants 1 records from Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh Herbarium (E) 1 records from Plant Resources Center 1 records from SLUI - Herbário Rosa Mochel 1 records from Royal Ontario Museum Green Plant Herbarium (TRT) 1 records from Sammlung Ernst Ule sinenumero Herbarium Hamburgense HBG 1 records from Geneva Herbarium – General Collection (G) 1 records from University of British Columbia Herbarium (UBC) - Vascular Plant Collection 1 records from Herbario Nacional Colombiano (COL) 1 records from University of Tennessee Vascular Herbarium 1 records from University of Alberta Vascular Plant Herbarium (ALTA-VP) 1 records from CONN 1 records from HFSL - Herbário Dr. Ary Tupinambá Penna Pinheiro 1 records from North Carolina State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 1 records from Taxon occurrence data for the FungalRoot database 1 records from Intermountain Herbarium (Vascular plants & algae) 2 records from EURISCO, The European Genetic Resources Search Catalogue 2 records from Caatinga Biome -
